comment:
The best Japanese whisky I’ve ever tried!

Nose: Chocolate, Soy Sauce, Sherry, Almonds, Cherry, Sweet n Sour sauce, Caramel, Tropical Fruit, Floral

Palate: Chocolate, Vanilla, Cherry, Caramel, Banana, Lychee,

Finish: long, vanilla, sweet n sour sauce, orange, mint, lemon frosting, chocolate caramels

72 euros for a 4 cl pour or 36 euros for a 2 cl pour
